before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"ddn8o","text":"This protocol will use an absorbance spectrophotometer that can measure volumes less than 200 μL. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":98}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1r4mr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bi8cf","text":"Prepare all required buffers and solutions before starting (see materials section).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6cadh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6pgo4","text":"If you already have dried neuromelanin (synthetic or endogenous), skip to step 13.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"fffe3","text":"There are limited methods for absolute quantification of neuromelanin in brain regions such as the substantia nigra and locus coeruleus. While stereology is typically used to quantify neuromelanin in these regions, it is semi-quantitative.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bn2o1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4lpgq","text":"A protocol for absolute quantification of neuromelanin using spectrophotometry was adapted for the modern laboratory. The process was improved so neuromelanin could be reliably quantified in formalin-fixed samples. A methodology to synthesise neuromelanin is also described, which prevents the wastage of substantia nigra neuromelanin since it is required for the calibration curve. The methodology described here is unbiased, high-throughput, and can measure neuromelanin concentration reliably.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"3l5ga","text":"Laboratory equipment","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":20}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fv6e9","text":"- 50 mL polypropylene conical centrifuge tube (14-432-22, Corning) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e9e9c","text":"- Mini plastic pestle, for homogenisation (F19923-0001, SP Bel-Art)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6erkm","text":"- 1.5 mL microcentrifuge tubes, with cap (1210-10, SSI Bio)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bmf19","text":"- Vortex mixer (K-550-GE, Vortex Genie)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"lqk1","text":"- Ultrasonic water bath (FXP 10DH, Unisonics)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8iq04","text":"- Absorbance spectrophotometer (NanoDrop One, Thermo Fisher Scientific)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cevi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bk39g","text":"Biological material","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4j8j7","text":"- Formalin-fixed human substantia nigra (or locus coeruleus), dissected into 2-10 mg pieces","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"uho4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ed53p","text":"Chemicals and reagents","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7hnqe","text":"- Sodium phosphate monobasic (≥99.0% powder, S0751, Sigma-Aldrich)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"pvfg","text":"- Sodium phosphate dibasic (≥99.0% powder, S0876, Sigma-Aldrich)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ntl0","text":"- Dopamine hydrochloride (≥98% powder, H8502, Sigma-Aldrich)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ljq0","text":"- L-cysteine (97% powder, 168149, Sigma-Aldrich)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9b5d","text":"- 1 M hydrochloric acid (1 M solution, J-4320-17, Fisher Chemical)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6dap6","text":"- Mushroom tyrosinase lyophilised powder (T3824, Sigma-Aldrich)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6s83o","text":"- Acetic acid (glacial, 10401, ECP Labchem)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4vg62","text":"- Sodium dodecyl sulfate (≥99.0% pellets, 75746, Sigma-Aldrich)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4t4hk","text":"- Tris base (≥99.9% powder, 15504020, Invitrogen)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"221uj","text":"- Sodium chloride (≥99.7% crystals, BSPSL944, LabServ)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8qqal","text":"- Acetone (≥99.8% solution, 2440-16, ECP Labchem)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6o12g","text":"- Proteinase K lyophilised powder (≥90% crystals, P1264, AG Scientific)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5ubaj","text":"- Sodium hydroxide (≥98% pellets, S5881, Sigma-Aldrich)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3ne7u","text":"- Calcium chloride dihydrate (≥99.0% crystals, C8106, Sigma-Aldrich)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9b9eu","text":"- Ultrapure water (Milli-Q, Merck-Millipore)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"28jf2","text":"- Nitrogen gas (BOC Healthcare)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"biu0m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bpj52","text":"Buffers and reagent stocks","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c4gme","text":"- Phosphate buffer (50 mM sodium phosphate monobasic + 50 mM sodium phosphate dibasic, in water, pH 7.4)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"504ui","text":"- Dopamine stock (79 mM (15 mg/mL) dopamine hydrochloride, in water)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f3pfk","text":"- L-cysteine stock (0.41 M (50 mg/mL) L-cysteine, in 1 M hydrochloric acid)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"amaph","text":"- Mushroom tyrosinase stock (8503 units/mL, in water)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ggjl","text":"- 33% acetic acid (diluted from glacial acetic acid, in water)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9d79q","text":"- Tris buffer (17 mM (5 mg/mL) sodium dodecyl sulfate + 50 mM Tris base, in water, pH 7.4)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2mqno","text":"- Sodium chloride solution (0.17 M (10 mg/mL) sodium chloride, in water)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4c4du","text":"- Tissue lysis solution (0.17 M sodium dodecyl sulfate + 400 mM Tris base, in water, pH 9.0)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"450l4","text":"- Sodium hydroxide solution (4 M sodium hydroxide, in water)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"69ipl","text":"* Prepare Proteinase K stock solution from the lyophilised powder as per manufacturer's instructions (we created a 10 mg/mL Proteinase K stock solution in 50 mM Tris base + 1 mM calcium chloride dihydrate, in water, pH 8.0)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"37vvi","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2s7nu","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"7irhk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1t6e2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4nodi","text":"Add 50 mL phosphate buffer, 630 μL  dopamine stock solution, 61 μL L-cysteine stock solution,  and 250 μL mushroom tyrosinase stock to an Erlenmeyer flask","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fr4fe","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"77dg3","text":"The reagent volumes listed here yields 10 mg of neuromelanin.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"et14h","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"dlk2q","text":"The room temperature in the lab was 22°C.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d4v9","text":"Wrap the flask with aluminium foil and make small holes on top; this protects the reaction from light but allows exposure to air. Put the flask in an incubator for 48 hours, at 37°C, with constant shaking (120 rpm).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"760nj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"enurv","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"9j46","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"result","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"e5nte","text":"The solution should appear dark at the end of the incubation.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ah74","text":"Stop the reaction by decreasing the solution pH to between 3 and 4, using 33% acetic acid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"75gf1","text":"Keep the solution wrapped in foil, as before. Incubate for 16 hours at 95°C, in an oven.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2mni","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"59kc8","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"f7mll","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"result","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"d0l05","text":"The solution should remain dark, but the pigment should appear more granular and settled at the bottom.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b90d8","text":"Transfer the solution into 50 mL polypropylene tubes. Centrifuge the solution for 15 minutes at 3800 x g. Pour off the supernatant and transfer the slurry at the bottom into a 2 mL microcentrifuge tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5c6p9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"c8rr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"52vke","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"b374f","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"6dugo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"82mks","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"52jl9","text":"The room temperature in the laboratory space was 22°C.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"87pu4","text":"Add 1.5 mL Tris buffer and incubate for 2 hours at 37°C.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4nslf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1utpb","text":"Centrifuge the tube for 2 minutes at 9000 x g. Pour off supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fqit8","text":"Add 1.5 mL sodium chloride solution and wash the pellet. Centrifuge the tube for 2 minutes at 9000 x g. Pour off supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"a7i6a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6u4o8","text":"Add 1.5 mL ultrapure water and wash the pellet. Centrifuge the tube for 2 minutes at 9000 x g. Pour off supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6o7e2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5ij9p","text":"Repeat this step once more.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":27}],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4t54i","text":"Add 1.5 mL acetone and wash the pellet. Centrifuge the tube for 2 minutes at 9000 x g. Pour off supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4rqql","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9go24","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"6l5b4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"result","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ecp97","text":"A small amount of acetone will be left behind, with the clean neuromelanin dispersed throughout. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2vh0g","text":"Dry the neuromelanin under flowing nitrogen gas for about 24 hours.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3kbjh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4t4ep","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"7rr2o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"result","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3gevi","text":"The acetone should be fully evaporated, and the neuromelanin should be completely dry.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"elht0","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1v86j","text":"The expected yield is ~80% of the starting mass of materials.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b75it","text":"Store the synthetic neuromelanin at -20°C in a closed plastic tube that is wrapped with aluminium foil to prevent light exposure.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5e7e2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"60spo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"c6020","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"crsev","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dtemh","text":"Add the frozen, dried neuromelanin to ultrapure water, adjust to pH 9.0. Sonicate in an ultrasonic ice water bath for 20 minutes. Store this solution at 4°C until use.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6cpq7","text":"We recommend making a 0.5 mg/mL stock solution of neuromelanin to make the process of creating the calibration curve easier. This stock can also be used for positive controls in the quantification process.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"92fh2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7jlhu","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"csf0p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2hjub","text":"Weigh 2-20 mg of fixed brain tissue (substantia nigra or locus coeruleus) using a high-accuracy scale. Homogenise the tissue in a 1.5 mL tube, using a mini plastic pestle, until a relatively fine homogenate is formed. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4pm68","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1bsbm","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"bbke5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8t01s","text":"These instructions are for analysing a single sample of brain tissue (2-20 mg). However, many samples can be easily analysed in parallel; prepare the necessary volumes of buffers and reagents as needed (see materials section).","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":17,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"3bkl6","text":"Negative controls can be included, which are processed the same as the samples, except no brain tissue or synthetic neuromelanin is added at the start.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"b1jih","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":17,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"2sduf","text":"Positive controls can also be included, which are processed the same as the samples, except a known amount of neuromelanin is spiked at the start.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7tmc6","text":"Add 1000 μL tissue lysis buffer, cap tubes, and incubate in a dry heating block for 90 minutes at 90°C. Shake tube halfway through incubation.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8jeu9","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9ccfd","text":"Centrifuge the tube for 10 minutes at 15,000 x g.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"eu19g","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9prjr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"77u3r","text":"Remove 900 μL of the supernatant using a micropipette, leaving behind 100 μL in the tube. Add 900 μL phosphate buffer.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ag7at","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"evc4","text":"Centrifuge the tube for 10 minutes at 15,000 x g.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d6i0b","text":"Create the Proteinase K digestion solution by adding Proteinase K to Tris buffer to achieve a concentration of 0.25 mg/mL Proteinase K. Keep solution on ice.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2joqn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7o2l7","text":"Remove 900 μL of the supernatant. Add 900 μL Proteinase K digestion solution. Incubate the tube overnight (12-14 hours) at 50°C, with constant shaking (130 rpm).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"at9iq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"41cd","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"415a6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"32bge","text":"Laying the tube along its length is recommended to allow adequate dispersion and digestion of the tissue.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6mmaq","text":"Centrifuge the tube for 10 minutes at 12,000 x g.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4dg4m","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fj0am","text":"Remove 900 μL of the supernatant, leaving behind 100 μL in the tube. Add 900 μL sodium chloride solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"67lg0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"eer5h","text":"Centrifuge the tube for 10 minutes at 12,000 x g.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9pchs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7gtph","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"25ma2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"result","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"aeah0","text":"There should be a dark pellet at the bottom of the tube. This is the neuromelanin that was in the original brain sample. The surrounding tissue has been digested by Proteinase K. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"99v5e","text":"Remove 950 μL of the supernatant, leaving behind 50 μL. Add 450 μL acetone.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1ln4h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"bveip","text":"Wait for 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"78c0b","text":"Vortex the tube for ~5 seconds.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ek1ek","text":"Place in a room-temperature ultrasonic water bath for 3 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ehhgc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ff0l3","text":"Centrifuge the tube for 10 minutes at 12,000 x g.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3uem3","text":"Remove 450 μL of the supernatant. Add 950 μL ultrapure water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"ag4g4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"e7orl","text":"Centrifuge the tube for 10 minutes at 12,000 x g.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ha9u","text":"Remove 900 μL of the supernatant, leaving behind 100 μL. Add 100 μL 4 M sodium hydroxide.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3drb8","text":"The final volume should be 200 μL. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"fjpaa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dto0u","text":"Sonicate the tube in a room-temperature ultrasonic water bath for 5 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"et3oj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bssj8","text":"Incubate for 1 hour at 80°C. Shake halfway through the incubation period.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4n2u0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"c6hl","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"adc89","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"result","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"rekj","text":"At the end of the incubation, no neuromelanin granules should be left at the bottom of the tube. If there is, increase the incubation period until all the neuromelanin has been dissolved.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4cdf8","text":"Centrifuge the tube for 10 minutes at 15,000 x g.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cs79n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dn0kj","text":"Measure the absorbance at 350 nm using an absorbance spectrophotometer; we used the NanoDrop One (Thermo Fisher Scientific). Use 2 M sodium hydroxide as the blank solution. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"86m5s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"6b57j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"csli0","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3tdv1","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"2qebb","text":"","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3arrm","text":"In triplicate, add 160 μL of the 0.5 mg/mL neuromelanin stock solution, 40 μL ultrapure water, and 200 μL 4 M sodium hydroxide into a  1.5 mL tube. This is a 200 μg/mL solution.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"5o2cf","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3gik4","text":"Incubate in a dry heating block for 1 hour at 80°C. Centrifuge for 5 minutes at 15,000 x g.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4a4dd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"doa6","text":"The standard curve that is suggested here is from a concentration range of 3.125 μg/mL to 100 μg/mL. It uses the synthetic neuromelanin stock solution created earlier. The neuromelanin concentrations found in the pigmented brain regions fall within the concentration range.","type":"align-left"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1rk6s","text":"Starting with the 200 μg/mL solution, use two-fold serial dilutions to create solutions that are 100, 50, 25, 12.5, 6.25, and 3.125 μg/mL. Use 2 M sodium hydroxide as the diluent.","type":"align-left","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6du4l","text":"Measure the absorbance at 350 nm using an absorbance spectrophotometer. Use 2 M sodium hydroxide as the blank solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"thq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6nfih","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fdcor","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"result","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"98f1q","text":"This data can be used to generate a calibration curve which can then be used to relate sample absorbance at 350 nm to known NM concentration. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
